original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhātuno saddhivihārikaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasman upanandaḥ sakya puttaḥ bhātunaḥ saddhivihārikam bhikkhum etat avoca
ehi āvuso janapada cārikam pakkamissāma ati
ehi āvuso aham te cīvaram dassāmi iti
bhagavā kira janapada cārikam pakkamissati iti
atha kho tassa bhikkhuno etat ahosi

original: “na dānāhaṁ āyasmatā upanandena sakyaputtena saddhiṁ janapadacārikaṁ pakkamissāmi, bhagavatā saddhiṁ janapadacārikaṁ pakkamissāmī”ti.
analyzed: na dāna aham āyasmatā upanandena sakya puttena saddhim janapada cārikam pakkamissāmi bhagavatā saddhim janapada cārikam pakkamissāmi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho āyasman upanandaḥ sakya putto tam bhikkhum etat avoca
ehi dāni āvuso janapada cārikam pakkamissāma ati

original: “Nāhaṁ, bhante, tayā saddhiṁ janapadacārikaṁ pakkamissāmi, bhagavatā saddhiṁ janapadacārikaṁ pakkamissāmī”ti.
analyzed: na aha bhante tayā saddhim janapada cārikam pakkamissāmi bhagavatā saddhim janapada cārikam pakkamissāmi iti

original: “Yampi tyāhaṁ, āvuso, cīvaraṁ adāsiṁ, mayā saddhiṁ janapadacārikaṁ pakkamissatī”ti,
analyzed: yam pi tyā āha āvuso cīvaram adāsi mayā saddhim janapada cārikam pakkamissati iti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindissatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmai upanandaḥ sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmam cīvaram da tvā kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ acchindissati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam upanandam sakya puttam aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, upananda, bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tvam upananda bhikkhussa sāmam cīvaram da tvā kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ acchindi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindissasi.
analyzed: kathan hi nāma tva moghapurisa bhikkhussa sāmam cīvaram da tvā kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ acchindissasi
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sāmam cīvaram datvā kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ a chindeyya vā a chindāpeyya vā nissaggiyam pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: channaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ, vikappanupagaṁ pacchimaṁ.
analyzed: channam cīvarānam aññataram cīvara vikappana upagam
an abhiraddhaḥ āhata cittaḥ khila jātaḥ

original: Sakiṁ āṇatto bahukampi acchindati, nissaggiyaṁ hoti.
analyzed: sakim āṇattaḥ bahukam pi a chindati nissaggiyam hoti

original: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā

original: “idaṁ me, bhante, cīvaraṁ bhikkhussa sāmaṁ datvā acchinnaṁ nissaggiyaṁ imāhaṁ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
analyzed: idam me bhante cīvaram bhikkhussa sāmam da tvā acchinnam nissaggiyam imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe

original: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī cīvaraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: upasampanne upasampanna saññī cīvaram da tvā kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ a chindati vā a chindāpeti vā nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Upasampanne vematiko cīvaraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: upasampanne vematikaḥ cīvaram da tvā kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ a chindati vā a chindāpeti vā nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī cīvaraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: upasampanne anupasampanna saññī cīvaram da tvā kupitaḥ anatta manaḥ a chindati vā a chindāpeti vā nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Aññaṁ parikkhāraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: aññam parikkhāram da tvā kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ a chindati vā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Anupasampannassa cīvaraṁ vā aññaṁ vā parikkhāraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindati vā acchindāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa cīvaram vā aññam vā parikkhāram da tvā kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ a chindati vā āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne an upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
